name: kanban-to-do-full-stack
description: Sistema Kanban completo para gerenciamento de tarefas

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd frontend && npm run dev" "cd backend && npm run dev"
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.start: concurrently "cd frontend && npm run start" "cd backend && npm run start"
